pkgmetadata.longdescription: # League Shop BaseReusable Django app## Quick startAdd "lsb" to your INSTALLED_APPS setting like this::``` INSTALLED_APPS = [ ... 'lsb', ]```## To specify top sold skin values parser, add the following settings:```LSB_SETTINGS = { 'top_sold_skin_values': { 'func': <dotted_module_string_path>, 'args': <args>, 'kwargs': <kwargs> }}For example:LSB_SETTINGS = { 'top_sold_skin_values': { 'func': 'lsb.utils.skins.get_top_sold_skin_values', 'args': [0, 150], 'kwargs': {} }}```
